allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript errors in CustomerAddressSelect.vue

- Allow undefined in AddressOption interface properties
- Use null instead of undefined for AddressCreateRequest
- Add null check before emitting address-created event

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript exactOptionalPropertyTypes errors

- Add undefined to optional interface properties
- Use null instead of undefined for API request properties
- Add null check for parsed time value
- Cast address type for emit compatibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix remaining TypeScript exactOptionalPropertyTypes errors

- Add null check and type cast in VendorAddressSelect
- Add fallback for undefined hours in useDateUtils
- Build params object conditionally in EmailsPage

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
